title: PRD ReDesign: OTC Category Page
background: Currently, our OTC subcategory pages are not optimized. All products are displayed in one long list with a 'show more' button. This approach makes navigation inefficient, especially for subcategories with large product counts.

scope.current_issue: No structured navigation or filtering exists today

solution: A well-structured OTC category page will allow users to quickly find the right product (by name, brand, or filters), compare options, and convert faster.

otc_organic_users.arrival: Enter from the OTC homepage and navigate into subcategories
seeking: To compare products within a subcategory to solve a problem

problem_statements: Users can't easily search by product name or brand within subcategories
With larger subcategories, users struggle to find relevant products (price/quality fit)
Lack of brand-level navigation reduces trust and makes it harder to shop by brand
Promotions and discounts are not highlighted clearly enough
success_metrics: % Conversion from product add-to-cart on a category page → paid order

design_sections.requirements: Company logo, Prescription button, My Account button, Shopping Cart button, Search bar + hamburger menu
Title: 'Online Pharmacy – {Subcategory Name}', Carousel of all subcategories (horizontal scroll), 4 USP icons
Carousel of all brands in the subcategory. Clicking logo → brand-specific page

Sorting dropdown with 7 options, Product cards with image, name, brand, price, discount info, package selector, add to cart button + counter. Desktop: 4 per row × 3 rows (12 total), Mobile: 2 per row × 5 rows (10 total), 'See more' button for lazy load
Banner at bottom with email input + CTA. Option to close (permanently dismiss).
Carousel of discounted products from other categories
5 most common FAQs (accordion, 1 open by default)
Standard footer with logo, accordion links, payment methods, certifications, company address, © 2025 DoktorABC, disclaimer

development_requirements.description: OTC sub-category page created automatically whenever a new sub-category is added under OTC category in system (DB/CMS)
Same OTC Navbar as OTC homepage: company logo, search bar (OTC products only), E-prescription button, cart icon, My Account icon, hamburger menu. Sticky during scroll.
Display OTC CRM coupon strip (same as OTC homepage). On mobile, appears above navbar. Link to BO: https://bo.doktorabc.com/upload-files Divided by mobile/Web and FR/DE
Display all OTC categories of current country from DB. If only a few categories, center them horizontally. Clicking category navigates to that OTC category page.

Each sub-category page has custom banner managed in DB (editable/replaceable). If discount percentage (%) is set for category in DB, discount badge appears on banner. Badge localized: 'Spezial-Angebot X% Rabatt' (DE) or French equivalent.
Display 4 USPs: Delivered 1-2 days, 24/7 customer service, Free shipping over €X (value from DB), Our own brand product. If free shipping value = 0, hide that USP and center other three.
Display all OTC brand logos for current country from DB as carousel strip. Clicking brand logo navigates to brand page.

Display all products of current sub-category. Default: 12 products. Desktop: 4 per row × 3 rows. Mobile: 2 per row × 6 rows. Products in random order with in-stock first. Sorting dropdown: Most popular, Promoted, Price low to high, Price high to low, A-Z, Z-A.

Each card: Image (with % discount badge if applicable), Product name, Brand name, Price, Previous price (crossed out in red if discounted), Quantity selector, Package selector, Add to cart button (changes to 'Added' on click)
Display 'Load more products' button. Clicking loads 3 additional rows each time. Desktop: 4 products per row (12 new), Mobile: 2 per row (12 new total). Continue until all shown.
Display CRM subscription banner sending lead data to HubSpot with page URL and category name parameters. User can click X to close banner.

Display carousel of product cards (same component as product section). Desktop: 1 row with 4 visible. Mobile: 1 row with 2 visible. Show up to 50 products. By default show promo products from BO, fill rest with random discounted products from other categories.
Display global user reviews component (same design and functionality as Homepage)
Display row of payment method logos matching supported methods for region
Display default FAQ section with 5 questions from DB. Localized (DE/FR). First question open by default.
Display global site footer identical to rest of site
